abstract: Howard Johnson's restaurant in Lake Placid, NY, will close after nearly 60 years, result of being bought by local restaurant owners; it is one of three Howard Johnson's restaurants still operating in country.
lead_paragraph: One of the restaurants still in business has been sold and will close after a nearly 60-year run in Lake Placid, N.Y.

headline.main: Howard Johnson’s Restaurant, One of Three Left, Will Close
headline.print_headline: Howard Johnson’s Restaurant, One of Three Left, Will Close

snippet: One of the restaurants still in business has been sold and will close after a nearly 60-year run in Lake Placid, N.Y.
